newsitem.title: LATVIA: TRANSIT BANK Q1 PROFIT 506,700 LATS.
newsitem.headline: TRANSIT BANK Q1 PROFIT 506,700 LATS.

text.p: Baltic Transit Bank said on Friday that its 1997 first quarter profit was 506,700 lats.

The bank said in a statement that assets at the end of March were 59.95 million lats, a rise of 8.59 million lats compared with the end of 1996, and its own capital was 8.01 million lats, an increase of 329,907 lats from end 1996.
